title: SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_STYLE
content:
0x8DB8CFFD58B62552// SetMouseCursorStyle
void SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_STYLE(int style);Parameters:style: Which sprite to change to, see declared enum eMousePointerStyle.Changes the mouse style.enum eMousePointerStyle {
	ARROW = 1,
	ARROW_DIMMED = 2,
	HAND_OPEN = 3,
	HAND_GRAB = 4,
	HAND_MIDDLE_FINGER = 5,
	ARROW_LEFT = 6,
	ARROW_RIGHT = 7,
	ARROW_UP = 8,
	ARROW_DOWN = 9,
	ARROW_TRIMMING = 10,
	ARROW_PLUS = 11,
	ARROW_MINUS = 12
};
Old name:  _SET_CURSOR_SPRITEOld name:  _SET_MOUSE_CURSOR_SPRITE
codeBlocks:
enum eMousePointerStyle {
	ARROW = 1,
	ARROW_DIMMED = 2,
	HAND_OPEN = 3,
	HAND_GRAB = 4,
	HAND_MIDDLE_FINGER = 5,
	ARROW_LEFT = 6,
	ARROW_RIGHT = 7,
	ARROW_UP = 8,
	ARROW_DOWN = 9,
	ARROW_TRIMMING = 10,
	ARROW_PLUS = 11,
	ARROW_MINUS = 12
};
